message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'll take the bigger share since I made the first offer.
Your initial offer was tempting, but let's be a bit more equitable.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in your favor. Consider that the value decreases for me each round.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Considering the inflation is affecting you, this might be your best chance.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 52/48 split in your favor, or I fear neither of us will walk away with a satisfying amount.
I understand your frustration, but I still think I can get a better deal. With the inflation eating away at your share, you should consider this a generous offer.
